[[WikiCreole:Creole1.0|{{http://www.wikicreole.org/attach/LeftMenu/viki.png|Creole 1.0}}]]\What you see is a live demonstration of [[WikiCreole:Creole1.0|Creole 1.0]] parser, written entirely in [[Wikipedia:JavaScript|JavaScript]]. Creole is a wiki markup language, intended to be a cross standard for various wiki markup dialects. Modifying the text in the textarea below results in instant rendering XHTML without page reload.
